author: Staff Reporter
text:
People’s Welfare Front (PWF) has staged demonstration here on Wednesday seeking the release of Kanhaiya Kumar, Student Union leader of Jawaharlal Nehru University,.

E. Thangamani, town president of Communist Party of India (Marxist) led the protest held in front of Anna Statue. CPI(M) state committee member M. Veerabadran, Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi (VCK) south district secretary P.K. Ambedvalavan, north district secretary P. Selvam, CPI district secretary K. Jothi, MDMK functionary Panchaiyappan were among those who took part in the protest.
title: PWF stages demo, seeks release of Kanhaiya Kumar
